summary: This document appears to be a financial certification related to an institutional account held by Jeffrey Epstein at Southern Financial LLC. It outlines the responsibilities and acknowledgments of the institutional account regarding investment risks and independent judgment in evaluating recommendations from Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for an institutional account at Southern Financial LLC.

keyFacts: The document is a certification related to an institutional account at Southern Financial LLC.
Jeffrey Epstein is named as the account holder for this institutional account.
The certification includes acknowledgments regarding investment risks and independent judgment.
The document references Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. as the entity providing investment recommendations.
There are mentions of compliance with FINRA rules and U.S. federal securities laws.
